alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; McPherson; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 3:09AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills ranging from 25 below to 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills ranging from 35 below to 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing and drifting snow can be expected Friday night through Saturday night.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; McPherson; Walworth
